actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act in order to require that the label of certain drugs include expiration dates regarding the effectiveness or potency of such drugs.

summary.text: Requires, under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act, that the label of drugs, whose safety, effectiveness, or potency becomes diminished after storage, specify the date beyond which the drug should not be used.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act in order to require that the label of certain drugs include expiration dates regarding the effectiveness or potency of such drugs.
